      • setIndexes

        public void setIndexes(int[] indexes)
        Set the indexes within the data element used by the plotter. For a line plotter, only one index is accepted.

      • plotDataIndex

        public void plotDataIndex(java.awt.Graphics2D g2,
                          DataList dataList,
                          int index)
        Plot a data list item. If the number of data items per plot unit is greater than 2, the union is plotted.
        Specified by:
        plotDataIndex in class DataPlotter
        Parameters:
        g2 - The graphics object.
        dataList - The data list to plot.
        index - The index to plot.

      • endPlot

        public void endPlot(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
        Termination method to end the plot and clear or close resources.
